text: The 2017 Greek Basket League Playoffs included the top eight place finishing teams of the 2016–17 Greek Basket League regular season. ==Bracket== Teams in bold won the playoff series. Numbers to the left of each team indicate the team's original playoff seeding. Numbers to the right indicate the score of each playoff game. ==First round== In the first round, the teams that finished in places 5 to 8 of the regular season standings, playing against each other have to win two games to win the series. Thus, if one team wins two games before all three games have been played, the remaining game is omitted. The team that finished in the higher regular season place, plays the first and the third (if necessary) game of the series at home. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=200|Team 1 !width=80| !width=200|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 |- | align=right|PAOK||2–0|| align=left|Lavrio DHI||82–65||78–68||— |- | align=right|Rethymno Cretan Kings||2–1|| align=left|Kolossos H Hotels||84–71||73–78||69–55 |} ===Game 1=== ===Game 2=== ===Game 3=== ==Quarterfinals== In the quarterfinals, teams playing against each other have to win two games to win the series. Thus, if one team wins two games before all three games have been played, the remaining game is omitted. The team that finished in the higher regular season place, is going to play the first and the third (if necessary) game of the series at home. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=200|Team 1 !width=80| !width=200|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 |- | align=right|Aris||2–0|| align=left|PAOK||69–65||75–84||— |- | align=right|AEK||2–0|| align=left|Rethymno Cretan Kings||90–78||81–70||— |} ===Game 1=== ===Game 2=== ==Semifinals== In the semifinals, teams playing against each other have to win three games to win the series. Thus, if one team wins three games before all five games have been played, the remaining games are omitted. The team that finished in the higher regular season place, is going to play the first, the third and the fifth (if necessary) game of the series at home. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=200|Team 1 !width=80| !width=200|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 !width=80|Game 4 !width=80|Game 5 |- | align=right|Olympiacos||3–0|| align=left|Aris||84–54||84–77||79–65||—||— |- | align=right|Panathinaikos Superfoods||3–1|| align=left|AEK||80–70||70–71||81–72||105–67||— |} ===Game 1=== ===Game 2=== ===Game 3=== ===Game 4=== ==Third place== In the series for the third place, teams playing against each other have to win three games to win the series. Thus, if one team wins three games before all five games have been played, the remaining games are omitted. The team that finished in the higher regular season place, is going to play the first, the third and the fifth (if necessary) game of the series at home. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=200|Team 1 !width=80| !width=200|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 !width=80|Game 4 !width=80|Game 5 |- | align=right|AEK||3–0|| align=left|Aris||90–74||91–85||71–60||—||— |} ===Game 1=== ===Game 2=== ===Game 3=== ==Finals== In the finals, teams playing against each other have to win three games to win the series. Thus, if one team wins three games before all five games have been played, the remaining games are omitted. The team that finished in the higher regular season place, is going to play the first, the third and the fifth (if necessary) game of the series at home. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=200|Team 1 !width=80| !width=200|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 !width=80|Game 4 !width=80|Game 5 |- | align=right|Olympiacos||2–3|| align=left|Panathinaikos Superfoods||63–58||80–84||64–62||58–71||51–66 |} ===Game 1=== ===Game 2=== ===Game 3=== ===Game 4=== ===Game 5=== ==References== ==External links== * Official Basket League Site * Official Basket League Site Category:2016–17 in Greek basketball
